snippet: The Food and Drug Administration said that the salmon would not have to be labeled as genetically engineered, consistent with its broader stance on widely eaten genetically modified foods.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration says genetically engineered salmon does not have to be labeled as such when it reaches grocery stores, process consistent with FDA stance on many widely eating foods made from genetically modified ingredients; rejects two petitions asking for labeling of all genetically engineered foods.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration said that the salmon would not have to be labeled as genetically engineered, consistent with its broader stance on widely eaten genetically modified foods.

headline.main: Genetically Engineered Salmon Will Not Be Labeled
headline.print_headline: No Labels Will Be Required for Engineered Salmon
